import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import HistoryAPI from '../../API/HistoryAPI'; import queryString from 'query-string'; MainHistory.propTypes = {}; function MainHistory(props) { const [listCart, setListCart] = useState([]); console.log(props) useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const params = { idUser: localStorage.getItem('id_user'), }; const query = '?' + queryString.stringify(params); const response = await HistoryAPI.getHistoryAPI(query); console.log(response); setListCart(response); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
